longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for holders
of a double or multiple entry visa issued by Switzerland, USA
or an EEA Member State  . The visa must be valid
for the total length of stay. (SEE NOTE 57265) 
    NOTE 57265: The max. stay of 90 days is granted within a 6
   month period.
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for holders
of a single entry visa issued by Switzerland, USA or an EEA
Member State  . Serbia must be the first point on
entry. The visa must be valid for the total length of stay.
(SEE NOTE 57265)
    NOTE 57265: The max. stay of 90 days is granted within a 6
   month period.
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days: 
 - for holders of normal passports issued to nationals of
   Russian Fed.;
Minors:
- Minors  
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds (in
  hard currency) to cover their stay and documents required
  for their next destination.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
